title: Escape Room
description: Escape room game, made by me, Sulaiman Husain & Kaya Kegel, made using HTML canvas and an own "engine". Personally I didn't really learn anything new.

title: TicTacToe
description: Simple TicTacToe game, made it with HTML, CSS and pure JS. We were supposed to work in groups, but everyone worked on their own project. Confoos.. Personally I didn't really learn anything new.

title: Hoger Lager
description: A game where you bet if dice roll higher than a said amount, if you win you get point, otherwise the bank gets them. Personally I didn't really learn anything new.

title: Bookflix
description: Netflix for books.. Made using HTML, CSS & JS with a python Flask backend and sqlite3 db. This means, that this website requires a backend to be running, therefore I can not exactly show it right now, as I'm not running the server. Contact me here for the source code. As for the things I learned, I learned how to hash passwords and store them in sqlite.

title: Web Catalogus
description: A school project about clothing, simple as that. Personally I didn't really learn anything new.

title: Dashboard
description: A school project about dashboards, simpl- Welp, we're learning chart.js
